heroDescription: We host, run, and ship Monynha projects with automation, security, and a love for code.
whatIsDescription: The central platform that orchestrates the entire Monynha ecosystem with cutting-edge technology.
feature1: Orchestration and deployment of our apps and microservices
feature2: Seamless integration with repositories and automations
feature3: Simple scalability: from prototype to production
feature4: Observability, security, and DevOps best practices
ecosystemDescription: Discover all the domains and platforms that make up our digital universe.
infraDescription: Running on central server with Coolify, supporting static sites and modern frameworks. Static builds and Next.js static export are fully supported.
footerManifesto: Technology with purpose, community with passion.
